learning_outcomes.description: The objective of this course is to write a critique of the literature in an area of specialisation & to develop archival skills in that area; develop an understanding of the literature, theory & practice in the chosen area.

assessments.due_date:
11/06/2025 2:00 pm

to be submitted directly to supervisor
assessments.task_description: 5000-word literature review
assessments.submission_guidelines: literature review to be submitted via Turnitin and directly to supervisor.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

learning_activities.learning_period: Multiple weeksFrom Week 1 To Exam week 1(24 Feb - 15 Jun)
